award_title: POSE: Phase I: Enabling an Open-Source Ecosystem for Marine Robotics
subject: When your students' tools get reused elsewhere
body:
Integrating multiple frameworks is painfulâ€”especially ensuring community contributions actually work outside the original dev environment.

We built Ouro to package computational tools so they're genuinely reusable across labs. When someone picks up software from your ecosystem, your students' names travel with it.

Happy to share more if you're interested. Also get it if you're heads-down through the holidays.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
